## Atmos handles all aspects of the custom design-build process: land due diligence, floor plan design, site planning, HOA approval, and vetted builder selection in the Charlotte and Raleigh markets.

Understanding your lot
Our in-house lot technology and land experts will assess the specific features of your lot (slope, setbacks, utility placements, etc.) and advise you on home placement and site design based on your budget.

Designing your perfect home plan
Through our schematic design process, our team will work closely with you to understand your needs and design goals. We then craft your fully custom, from scratch floor plan around this vision while ensuring target budget and lot constraints are accounted for.

Vetted builders bid and build your project
You’ll finalize all pre-construction and design with your Atmos team, then receive two scope-of-works and bids from our network of vetted building partners.
OUR VETTED BUILDER NETWORK
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b93e4971e59d1aa4ab8b55/660f573eeb8b510a32e0f663_Frame%206533.png)
We have relationships with some of the highest quality custom builders in Charlotte & Raleigh metro areas, each specializing in different styles of homes and price ranges.
Builder 1
15+ years of experience and a National Association of the Remodeling Industry (NARI) award winner for Best Contractor and Best Subcontractor in Charlotte.
3 BUILDS IN PROGRESS
Builder 2
CHOICE
5+ years of experience that has built two Atmos homes to 5 star reviews. Ranks in the top 10% of North Carolina licensed contractors on BuildZoom
2 ATMOS BUILDS IN PROGRESS
Builder 3
25+ years of experience that has built two Atmos homes to 4.75 star reviews. Specializes in very large homes.
3 BUILDS IN PROGRESS
The choice is yours: select a builder to start construction
Once your site planning and custom floor plan design is finished, your PM will facilitate and present builder bids for you to consider.
1
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b93e4971e59d1aa4ab8b55/65fda22536b6d8406277cfb5_Frame%206232.png)
Receive at least two bids from builders within our network
Builders will submit their best price based on your site development requirements and custom floor plan for the construction of your home.
2
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b93e4971e59d1aa4ab8b55/65fdc357f967432faba09363_AtmosRDU02_Final-61%201.png)
Tour existing projects and meet with potential builders
Your Atmos Project Manager will organize builder interviews and tours of their existing projects that match your home style, so you make the right choice.
3
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b93e4971e59d1aa4ab8b55/65fdc38b92ba7f3f5800773c_Belden%20Residence%20High%20Level%20Design%201.png)
Select your builder, close on your construction loan and start building
After choosing your builder, Atmos will help you finalize your construction permits then have extensive project debriefs with your builder to ensure a smooth transition.
4
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64b93e4971e59d1aa4ab8b55/65fdc3aa22e690320e1120be_IMG_6694%201.png)
Atmos supports you throughout construction of your new home
During the construction phase, Atmos provides build support based on the pre-construction services we have completed on your behalf.
We handle everything for 6%
Instead of coordinating with and paying 10+ vendors over $75,000+, Atmos guides you through the entire homebuilding process with one point of contact—your Atmos project manager—and bundles all costs into one 6% fee that’s rolled into your loan, so you can focus on building your dream home.

**Mission:**
Atmos aims to streamline the entire homebuilding journey. They provide an all-in-one platform where potential homeowners can navigate every stage of building their dream home—from initial design to construction—all from the comfort of their own screens.

- **Lot assessments**: Experts evaluate the specific characteristics of chosen land.
- **Custom floor plan design**: Every home is tailored to the unique needs and preferences of its future occupants.
- **Builder network**: Atmos connects clients with vetted builders in the Charlotte and Raleigh areas, ensuring high-quality workmanship and competitive pricing.
  
The company currently offers options such as:
- Partnered lot listings
- Custom designs on your property
- A detailed portfolio of past projects

**Financial Model:**
Atmos offers a simplified fee structure—a 6% consolidated fee that rolls into the homeowner's financing—unlike traditional methods that can involve multiple vendors and hidden costs. This streamlined approach not only saves time but also enhances the overall experience for clients, who have a single point of contact throughout their journey.

**Location and Team:**
Atmos is headquartered in the vibrant San Francisco Bay Area, a fitting locale for such an innovative approach to homebuilding. Their relatively small team allows for agility and close collaboration, whether it’s with builders or clients.

With successful fundraising and a growing reputation, Atmos is making waves in the property tech (PropTech) sector. Their forward-thinking methods have garnered attention from notable platforms like TechCrunch and Forbes, underscoring their potential to reshape custom homebuilding.

**In Conclusion:**
Atmos embodies a fresh, technology-driven approach to homebuilding, making the experience accessible, transparent, and fully customizable.
